divs: Sighting Detailswe were on the green playing football (soccer) and i looked up and saw a bronze shape disk hovering. in then whiped out my mobile phone and took two pictures. it then shot away as me and my friends harry and james were astonished. 1. football (soccer) 2. i headered the ball and looked up to see the ball 3. frizby 4. hovered for a brief moment then disapeard behind the clouds 5. scared, horrified, shocked, astonished, bewildered, amazed etc. 6. it disapeared behind the clouds

Summary: I hovered for a brief time pictures have been taken.
